$PRKR Judge allows patent infringement case against $AAPL & $QCOM to proceed.  https://www.nasdaq.com/article/parkervision-gets-favorable-venue-ruling-in-patent-infringement-suit-20180312-00492

links.title: ParkerVision Gets Favorable Venue Ruling In Patent Infringement Suit
links.description: (RTTNews.com) - ParkerVision, Inc. (PRKR) a developer of semiconductor technology solutions for wireless applications, said that it has received a favorable venue ruling from a federal court judge in its patent infringement case against Qualcomm Inc. (QCOM) and Apple Inc. ( AAPL ).

messages.body: $SPY $AAPL $BAC $MCD Tax Cut Phase II, buy buy buy https://www.cnbc.com/2018/03/12/trump-wants-a-phase-two-of-tax-cuts.html

links.title: Trump wants a 'phase two' of tax cuts
links.description: President Donald Trump said again Monday that he wants a "phase two" of tax cuts on top of the law Republicans passed in December. Speaking as the World Series champion Houston Astros visited the White House, Trump asked Rep. Kevin Brady, R-Texas, whether he planned to cut taxes further.

messages.body: Head of AMD's Largest Segment Tells TheStreet: Expect More Share Gains in 2018 $AMD $INTC $NVDA $AAPL http://bit.ly/2p9i0KQ @amd

links.title: Head of AMD's largest segment tells TheStreet: expect more share gains in 2018
links.description: Though competition from Intel ( INTC) is intensifying, the head of AMD's ( AMD) largest reporting segment insists new and upcoming products leave his company well-positioned to add to its 2017 CPU share gains. Ahead of a public webinar going over AMD's CPU efforts, I had a chance to talk with Jim Anderson, the General Manager of the chipmaker's Computing and Graphics (C&G) group.
